chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Forging of a Hammer
chapters.info: Jondyn Barran, p. 172 (196)—Grizzled old man from the Two Rivers. He is a better bowshot than anyone in the Two Rivers except Tam al'Thor and possibly Abell Cauthon, and he is the best hunter bar none. He is also a good woodsman. He always says what he thinks, regardless of who hears. He is now traveling with Perrin.
